name: The Lunar Mask
description:
The Lunar Mask is an action-adventure game where you fight monsters with your sword to get back the magical artifact called The Lunar Mask which is deep down into the enemies' castle.  The game is VERY HARD and has multiple challenging bosses!

Features: 

- 40+ minutes of playtime

- 3 Boss battles

- 3  levels

- Smooth gameplay

- Immersive storyline

Controls:

W A S and D controls to move forward left or fight with basic arrow key controls

Click to swing the sword

Click on potion/power-up OR SWORD to obtain the item

Click to extinguish fireballs

Click to pick up KEY
